title: Camelot Teleport

properties.name: description
properties.value: Camelot Teleport teleports the caster to the front gate of Camelot. Camelot Teleport is an excellent training spell, because you can use an air staff and use up only one law rune per cast for extremely quick and easy experience. It is possible to earn upwards of 80k Magic experience an hour with this method of training, however most players switch to using High Level Alchemy when 55 Magic is achieved.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Camelot TeleportThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Camelot teleport
This article is about the teleport spell. For the teleport tablet, see Camelot teleport (tablet).
Camelot Teleport
Released 18 March 2002 (Update)
Members Yes
Level 45
Spellbook Standard
Type Teleport
Experience 55.5
Runes 5 1
Casting speed 4 ticks
Description Teleports you to Camelot
Animation
Sound Effect

Camelot Teleport teleports the caster to the front gate of Camelot. Camelot Teleport is an excellent training spell, because you can use an air staff and use up only one law rune per cast for extremely quick and easy experience. It is possible to earn upwards of 80k Magic experience an hour with this method of training, however most players switch to using High Level Alchemy when 55 Magic is achieved.

After completing the Kandarin Hard tasks, you may switch the location of the teleport to Seer's bank by right-clicking the spell and choosing Toggle-location.

Destination[edit | edit source]

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
7 April 2016
(update)

The right-click options on the Camelot teleport spell have been adjusted slightly to make it more convenient to configure.

5 March 2015
(update | poll)

You can now change the Camelot teleport location to just outside the Seers' Village bank if you have completed the Kandarin Hard Diary.
